name: Proof_318 — Evening Temperature Reading (2025-12-11, 16:44)
description:
At 16:44 on 2025-12-11, an evening environmental reading was taken in the duck shelter at MaMeeFarm.  
Measured values were 25.6°C indoors, 25.3°C outdoors, with relative humidity at 68%.

This dataset provides verifiable microclimate indicators under the DGCP™ continuous proof system, documenting late-day thermal and humidity conditions relevant to animal welfare.

License: DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
